category: Member City/Provincial Sports Association Regulations/Article 19 (Convocation of Board of Directors, etc.)
contents: Article 19 (Convening of the Board of Directors, etc.) ① The Chairman shall convene the Board of Directors as necessary and become its chairman. Revised July 5, 2023 ② When convening a board of directors meeting, the agenda, date, time, and location must be clearly stated and notified to each director in writing (including electronic documents) at least 5 days prior to the meeting. However, if there are urgent reasons, the period may be shortened. Revised on March 23, 2017, May 10, 2022. ③ The Chairman shall convene a board of directors meeting within 10 days when there is a request to convene under any of the following items. 1. When the majority of registered directors present the purpose of the meeting and request a convening. 2. When the auditor requests a convening pursuant to Article 28, Paragraph 4, Item 4. ④ If the board of directors meeting is not convened despite the provisions of Paragraph 3, it is convened. A director or auditor who requests a meeting may convene a board meeting. However, when a director or auditor convenes a board meeting, the older person among the directors or auditors who requested the meeting becomes the person with the authority to convene the board meeting, and the senior member presides and elects the chairman from among the directors present. Revised March 23, 2017. ⑤ The Board of Directors may only decide on agenda items notified in advance. However, if all present directors agree, other items may be submitted and resolved. Revised on May 10, 2022. ⑥ Directors cannot participate in the resolution of matters involving the exchange of money or property, and when the interests of the directors and the city/provincial sports council are conflicting. ⑦ The board of directors may deliberate and make resolutions through remote communication means, etc. without all or part of the directors attending the meeting in person, and the necessary matters shall be determined separately. Newly established 2021. 10. 6., 2022. 5. 10.
